Example:
* I am ________, year _____ student majoring in __________.
* Having skills in ______________. 
* Learning _________ (softwares, programming languages, etc.).
* Desired team: (Frontend, Backend, UI, or Marketing)
* Email: box@box.com
* Here is my CV: (link)
